软件包 us.codecraft.webmagic.downloader

Downloader is the part that downloads web pages and store in Page object.

接口摘要
Downloader Downloader is the part that downloads web pages and store in Page object.
 

类摘要
AbstractDownloader Base class of downloader with some common methods.
FileCache Download file and saved to file for cache.
HttpClientDownloader The http downloader based on HttpClient.
HttpClientGenerator
